front.title: IEEE/IEC International Standard - Nuclear power plants -- Instrumentation and control important to safety -- Electrical equipment condition monitoring methods - Part 6: Insulation resistance

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This IEC/IEEE standard specifically focuses on insulation resistance measurement methods for monitoring of the dielectric condition of instrumentation and control cables during simulation of design basis events. This IEC/IEEE standard is the sixth part of the IEC/IEEE 62582-series. It contains detailed descriptions of condition monitoring based on insulation resistance measurements.
